<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Cursed Guardian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2225)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 62</row>

**Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -3

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 58

**Deadeye's Shame** The cursed guardian has weakness 5 to all damage inflicted upon it by a worshipper of [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=6), and it takes a –2 circumstance penalty to all saving throws to resist effects caused by worshippers of Erastil. If it ever suffers a critical hit from or critically fails a save against an effect caused by a worshipper of Erastil, the cursed guardian is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14,
**Damage** 2d6+8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d4+8 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Mauler**   The cursed guardian gains a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures it [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18).

**Rush** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The cursed guardian Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. During the Stride, it gains a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed.

</column>
